      • createExpressionWithTags

        public void createExpressionWithTags​(char character,
                                     boolean errorInExpression)
        This method creates a new expression with "$" before wrong symbol.
        Parameters:
        character - symbol from expression without "$"
        errorInExpression - true, if it's wrong symbol - add "$" false, if it's correct symbol - don't add anything

      • checkIfNotAllowedSigns

        public boolean checkIfNotAllowedSigns()

        Returns:
        true if wrong expression, false if good expression
